annotation_sentence: I'm really interested in software development and have been working on a few personal projects.

annotation_sentence: Sure! I developed a mobile app for organizing study schedules.

annotation_sentence: I tackled this by gathering feedback from peers and iterating based on their suggestions.

annotation_sentence: I found it more effective to watch users interact with the app and note their reactions.
rationale: The word 'I' is a reference to the speaker, Taylor, who is sharing their method of gathering user feedback.

annotation_sentence: I believe my greatest strength is my ability to communicate effectively.
rationale: The word 'I' is a reference to the speaker, Taylor, who is expressing their belief about their own strength.

annotation_sentence: I make sure everyone is on the same page and encourage open dialogue.
rationale: The word 'I' is a reference to the speaker, Taylor, who is describing their communication style.

annotation_sentence: Yes, I was wondering about the team dynamics here.

annotation_sentence: Thank you for the information and for the opportunity to interview, Alex.
